title: Las Patronas, Mexican women's group giving food aid to migrants crossing the border
brief_description: Las Patronas, Mexican women’s group giving food aid to migrants crossing the border
description: Las Patronas, a group of Mexican volunteer,s have been passing food and water to South American migrants heading to the US border on top of freight trains for many years. This video has been shared widely with some viewers questioning if it’s virality puts the work in danger. However, Las Patronas have their own social media channels to raise awareness and funding for their work.
description_for_label: Las Patronas, Mexican women’s group giving food aid to migrants crossing the border
